name: Mesh Simulator
short_description:
As I am currently studying a module on object oriented coding methods I thought it was probably a good idea to actually write some OO code.

This is a little project to write a simulator for flexible meshes.  I will be using openGL to render these as either wire meshes or curved sheets.  The plan is to be able to manipulate the mesh to set up waves and vibrations.  I will also aim to be able to drop objects onto sheets and simulate the resulting behaviour accurately.

Essentially I am aiming for something that will give a fairly realistic rendering of what would happen if you dropped a bowling ball onto a trampoline.
summary: Simulation of flexible meshes and sheets
